title: Diagnosis of Metabolic Syndrome
text: package used diagnose metabolic syndrome. criteria used diagnose based National Cholesterol Education Program - Adult Treatment Panel -III guidelines (NCEP-ATP-III). comprised multiple parameters includes waist circumference, systolic blood pressure, diastolic blood pressure, fasting plasma glucose, triglycerides high-density lipoprotein cholesterol. Hence, package useful healthcare settings easy quick diagnosis metabolic syndrome.

title: Diagnosis of Metabolic Syndrome
code: library(MetabolicSyndrome) MetabolicSyndrome(x) # x is the dataframe containing all the parameters required to dignose metabolic syndrome.

title: Diagnosis of Metabolic Syndrome
text: Use exact column names specified Gender - Gender Male Female WC -Waist Circumference cm TG - Triglycerides mg/dL HDLC - High Density Lipoprotein Cholesterol mg/dL SBP - Systolic BP mm Hg DBP - Diastolic BP mm Hg FPG - Fasting plasma glucose mg/dL
